oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Reunion badge of Sgt. James S. Scott, Co. F, 46th Tenn. Inf., CSA
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Confederate Veteran Reunion Medal of Sgt.James S. Scott, Co. F, 46th Tenn. Inf., CSA. Scott was from Puryear, Henry Co., Tenn. His regiment was captured at Island No. 10 on April 8, 1862 and sent to Camp Douglas, Illinois. He expressed interest in taking; the oath of allegiance, but apparently did not. Reunion badges of this type were very popular with Confederate Veterans and were often sold by mail order through Confederate Veteran Magazine.
